sentences.sContent: Could you get me a coffee from the drinks machine ?
sentences.sCn: 给我从自动饮料机里买一罐咖啡好吗？

sentences.sContent: Did you put my dirty shirts in the machine (= washing machine ) ?
sentences.sCn: 你把我的脏衬衫放进洗衣机里了吗？

sentences.sContent: I left a message for you on your machine (= telephone answering machine ) .
sentences.sCn: 我在你的电话答录机里留了言。

sentences.sContent: The machine wouldn’t let me have any money (= cash machine ) .
sentences.sCn: 自动取款机不让我取钱。

synos.tran: 机械，[机]机器；机构；机械般工作的人

phrases.pCn: [建]切削机，切割机；裁切机，裁剪机；截煤机；下料压力机
机器学习（能力）；机器改进（能力）
包装机，包装机械；打包机；封装机

words.tran: 机械；机器；机构；机械装置
机械工；机械师；机械安装修理工

trans.tranOther: a piece of equipment with moving parts that uses power such as electricity to do a particular job
